thing-type.label: ZigBee Automation
thing-type.description: A OpenWebNet ZigBee automation device to control roller shutters, blinds, etc. BTicino models: xxx/yyyy/etc.

parameter.name: shutterRun
parameter.label: Shutter Run
parameter.description: Time (in ms) to go from max position (e.g. CLOSED) to the other position (e.g. OPEN). Example: 12000 (=12sec). Use AUTO (default) to calibrate the shutter automatically (UP->DOWN->Position%) the first time a Position command (%) is sent.

parameter.name: where
parameter.label: OpenWebNet Device Address
parameter.description: It identifies one ZigBee device. Use decimal format address without the UNIT part and network: ZigBee WHERE=414122201#9 -> OpenWebNet Device Address = 4141222
